page.title: 20LANGUAGE
page.content: Llanelli is a bilingual town where both Welsh and English is spoken. Five of us compiled a simple questionnaire and went out to interview a sample of people with the aim of finding out how much Welsh is spoken in our area today. We discovered that 57% of the people interviewed spoke Welsh as a first language but only 28% of these spoke Welsh in their homes while 9% spoke both English and Welsh at home.The reason for this was because people were married to partners who did not speak Welsh. Not many children in our school speak Welsh as a first language because most Welsh speaking children attend one of the two Welsh-Medium schools in the area. {....Stuart Jones,Adam Day,Neil Morgan, {Matthew Hammond,Michael Cole. }
